description:
Fully functional whiteboard plugin that is easy to set up and well-documented. 

Great for teams to collaborate and get their work done. 

The Rockstar of your SaaS application will be Wonderful Whiteboard.

● Changes you make are broadcasted to other participants within a few seconds.
●  Create as many boards as you need.
● Share with anyone! Invite your team mates or friends to your boards to share ideas.

DEMO
---
https://wonderfulplugins.bubbleapps.io/wonderful-whiteboard

DOCUMENTATION
---
https://kod-suz.notion.site/Wonderful-Whiteboard-Visual-Collaboration-74fd9916f0aa49c4baeae51a3f15c718

UPGRADE YOUR APP WITH KODSUZ PRODUCTS
---
https://bubble.io/contributor/kod-suz-1507704140197x829404746415093500

FOR ALL YOUR QUESTIONS
---

name: Wonderful Whiteboard - Visual Collaboration
plugin_instructions:
1- Draw "Whiteboard" element into your page

2- Enter your Client ID and the board's code (documented) 

That's all!


You can find your keys from here (You can learn how to do it in details with our document): https://www.whiteboard.team/app/panel/developers
-You can pass client secret in Api-Key
